channel.title: Help with super sets
channel.description: Is it possible to make it when a player logs out or in or anything, there stats stay the same for super set except if they die. So pretty much if i drink super str my stats would stay at 117 (assuming im 99 str) and it would never go down unless I die in the wilderness. Also if restarting server would effect that at all. Using Demise pking btw Thanks you :]

item.title: Help with super sets
item.dc:creator: @Benjamin1160 Benjamin1160
item.description:
@Benjamin1160 wrote:

Is it possible to make it when a player logs out or in or anything, there stats stay the same for super set except if they die.
So pretty much if i drink super str my stats would stay at 117 (assuming im 99 str) and it would never go down unless I die in the wilderness. Also if restarting server would effect that at all. Using Demise pking btw
Thanks you :]
